original: @44a *// ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: @44a *// ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
translated: Why would a yogin not engage in this?üîΩAs long as there is a body,

analyzed: ji tsam ma zhig lus yod dang // ji tsam du ni blo 'byung ba //

original: de bar rnal 'byor ye shes la //
analyzed: de bar rnal 'byor ye shes la //
translated: for that long, in the wisdom of yoga,

original: ma bshol bsam gtan rab tu gyis //
analyzed: ma bshol bsam gtan rab tu gyis //
translated: one should practice concentration without delay.

original: thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam ltar //
analyzed: thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam ltar //

original: 'byung ba gsum kun rab tu ltos //
analyzed: 'byung ba gsum kun rab tu ltos //

original: smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ni //
analyzed: smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ni //
translated: Like a mirage, like the moon in water,

original: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
translated: why would a yogin not engage in this?

original: ji bzhin dri za'i grong khyer na //
analyzed: ji bzhin dri za'i grong khyer na //
translated: Just as in the city of gandharvas,

original: 'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam par snang //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam par snang //
translated: the conduct of beings appears,

original: de bzhin lus la phung po'i spyod //
analyzed: de bzhin lus la phung po'i spyod //
translated: so in the body, the conduct of the aggregates

original: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
translated: why would a yogin not engage in this?

original: rmi lam dag na 'gro ba'i tshogs //
analyzed: rmi lam dag na 'gro ba'i tshogs //

original: ji ltar rmi lam rmi bas mthong //
analyzed: ji ltar rmi lam rmi bas mthong //

original: de bzhin phung po'i gnas yin na //
analyzed: de bzhin phung po'i gnas yin na //
translated: So in the body, the abode of the aggregates,

original: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
translated: why would a yogin not engage in this?

original: sa 'di sa la sogs pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: sa 'di sa la sogs pa'i tshogs //

original: 'dus pa rdul gyi phung po yin //
analyzed: 'dus pa rdul gyi phung po yin //

original: 'di sems sems byung tshogs yin par //
analyzed: 'di sems sems byung tshogs yin par //

original: rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun ltos shig /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun ltos shig /

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po rnams //üîΩphan tshun kun nas 'dus pa ste //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po rnams // phan tshun kun nas 'dus pa ste //
translated: The four great elementsüîΩare mutually combined,

original: gdeg pa la sogs ldan pa yin //
analyzed: gdeg pa la sogs ldan pa yin //
translated: and they are endowed with rising and so forth.

original: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
translated: Why do you not engage in yoga?

original: 'di ni rlung dang mkhris pas myos //
analyzed: 'di ni rlung dang mkhris pas myos //
translated: This is like a corpse, deluded by wind and bile,

original: ro bslas lta bur gnas pa ste //
analyzed: ro bslas lta bur gnas pa ste //
translated: and it remains like a corpse.

original: byed pa gang yang yod pa min //
analyzed: byed pa gang yang yod pa min //
translated: It does not have any activity whatsoever.

original: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
translated: Why do you not engage in yoga?

original: dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu kun //
analyzed: dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu kun //

original: 'gro ba gnas shing g-yo ba'i rnams //üîΩsmig rgyu 'dra ba'i 'du shes su //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnas shing g-yo ba'i rnams // smig rgyu 'dra ba'i 'du shes su //
translated: are the moving and abiding of beings.üîΩThe perception of a mirage

original: rdza la sogs pa shin tu rtogs //
analyzed: rdza la sogs pa shin tu rtogs //

original: tshor ba chu bur lta bu @44b ste;/
analyzed: tshor ba chu bur lta bu @44b ste;/
translated: Feelings are like water bubbles,

original: bde dang mi bder rtog pa yin //
analyzed: bde dang mi bder rtog pa yin //

original: chu shing 'dra ba'i 'du byed rnams //
analyzed: chu shing 'dra ba'i 'du byed rnams //

original: zhig pa grugs pa snying po med //
analyzed: zhig pa grugs pa snying po med //
translated: which, when destroyed, is hollow and without essence.

original: rnam par shes par sgyu ma 'dra //
analyzed: rnam par shes par sgyu ma 'dra //

original: de yi dngos la gnas pa med //
analyzed: de yi dngos la gnas pa med //
translated: and it does not abide in its entity.

original: rtsva shing gnas pa ji bzhin te //
analyzed: rtsva shing gnas pa ji bzhin te //
translated: Just like grass and trees,

original: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //
translated: why do you not engage in yoga?

original: 'di ni rmi lam rnam myos 'di //üîΩ'di ni sgyu ma bus pa 'drid //
analyzed: 'di ni rmi lam rnam myos 'di // 'di ni sgyu ma bus pa 'drid //
translated: This is a dream, a state of madness.üîΩThis is an illusion, a deception.

original: 'di dag thams cad smig rgyu ste //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad smig rgyu ste //
translated: All of this is a mirage,

original: de bzhin dri za'i grong khyer ro //
analyzed: de bzhin dri za'i grong khyer ro //

original: gang rgyan 'di dag snang ba yi //üîΩkhams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
analyzed: gang rgyan 'di dag snang ba yi // khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //

original: de kun blo yis rtogs bya ba //
analyzed: de kun blo yis rtogs bya ba //

original: 'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis //
analyzed: 'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis //

original: nyes pa'i rkyen ni rtsva dang bcas //
analyzed: nyes pa'i rkyen ni rtsva dang bcas //

original: ye shes me yis rab bsregs na //
analyzed: ye shes me yis rab bsregs na //

original: lha rdzas bde ba yod par 'gro //
analyzed: lha rdzas bde ba yod par 'gro //

original: rnal 'byor can gnas stug por yang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gnas stug por yang //
translated: The fearless ones also dwell in the thick forest,

original: 'jigs med 'di ni mtshan ma med //
analyzed: 'jigs med 'di ni mtshan ma med //

original: mtshan ma bcings pa'i ngo bo can //
analyzed: mtshan ma bcings pa'i ngo bo can //

original: mtshan ma med pa rtag tu bde //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa rtag tu bde //

original: mtshan ma sems kyi spyod yul lo //
analyzed: mtshan ma sems kyi spyod yul lo //

original: sems kyi spyod yul bden pa min //
analyzed: sems kyi spyod yul bden pa min //

original: bden pa blo gros spyod yul te //
analyzed: bden pa blo gros spyod yul te //

original: sems ni shes rab spyod yul te //
analyzed: sems ni shes rab spyod yul te //

original: mtshan mar gnas pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan mar gnas pa med pa'o //

original: kye ma mtshan ma 'di kun yin //
analyzed: kye ma mtshan ma 'di kun yin //

original: gnas gsum tshangs par bsgrags pa ste //
analyzed: gnas gsum tshangs par bsgrags pa ste //

analyzed: mtshan ma ming dang yul rnams dang // sgra la sogs pa kun brjod pa'o //

original: dbang po kun gyi yul rnams ni //
analyzed: dbang po kun gyi yul rnams ni //

analyzed: lus can rnams kyi 'ching ba'i rgyu //

original: 'ching bar bya dang 'ching dang rgyu //
analyzed: 'ching bar bya dang 'ching dang rgyu //

original: gang 'grol gang @45a *//
analyzed: gang 'grol gang @45a *//

analyzed: gis 'grol ba dang // thar dang thar ba'i bde ba dang / mthong pa'i chos la gnas pa dang // bdag med pa ru shes nyid kyang //

original: 'dod chags bcom par gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags bcom par gyur pa na'o //
translated: when desire is conquered.

original: de nas mi bdag rin chen gtsug /
analyzed: de nas mi bdag rin chen gtsug /

analyzed: blo chen byang chub sems dpa' yis //

original: rnal 'byor can kun dbang la smras //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can kun dbang la smras //

original: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la //

original: bya ba'i zhing rnams thams cad la //
analyzed: bya ba'i zhing rnams thams cad la //

original: rgyal sras khyod ni brtson pa ste //
analyzed: rgyal sras khyod ni brtson pa ste //

original: rgyal ba rnams la khyod tshad de //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams la khyod tshad de //

original: rnal 'byor can la nye bar gnas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can la nye bar gnas //

analyzed: rnal 'byor the tshom bcad pa ste; ;dpe rnams grub par bya ba'i phyir //

original: brtag bya yan lag thams cad dag /
analyzed: brtag bya yan lag thams cad dag /

original: lus can rnams kyi lus skyes pa //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi lus skyes pa //

analyzed: tshul ni sgra yis brjod par mdzod //

original: tshig tu brjod par cir mi bgyi //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod par cir mi bgyi //

original: gnad dang zung gis rnam par mdzod //
analyzed: gnad dang zung gis rnam par mdzod //
translated: Please explain it with the key points and the pairs.üîΩDestroy the causes of what cannot be grasped

analyzed: mi zin pa yi rgyu rnams dang // bgab zungs nor gyis gzhom par gyis //

analyzed: phung po'i rgyu rnams bsal bar mdzod // yang dag 'gyur ba med pa dang // dge ba yis kyang mkhas pas so //

original: ring po mi thogs thar pa 'thob //
analyzed: ring po mi thogs thar pa 'thob //

original: phung po'i rgyu rnams bsregs nas su //
analyzed: phung po'i rgyu rnams bsregs nas su //

analyzed: chos min chos kyi tshe 'byung ste //

analyzed: 'di dang gzhan du'ang 'thob par 'gyur //

analyzed: shes pas sdug bsngal rnams las 'grol //

original: sred pa yis ni rtag tu bcings //
analyzed: sred pa yis ni rtag tu bcings //

analyzed: mi shes las dang @45b sred pa yis //üîΩlus can rgya cher shin tu byas //

analyzed: gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang // rnam shes yul la mngon gyur pas //

analyzed: myur phyir khong du mi chud pa //

original: spyod yul du ni sems rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: spyod yul du ni sems rgyu ba'o //

analyzed: yid sngon 'gro ba chos rnams te //

original: lus can kun gyi de bzhin no //
analyzed: lus can kun gyi de bzhin no //

original: yid 'gro yid ni gces pa dag /
analyzed: yid 'gro yid ni gces pa dag /

original: yid du 'ong bas cir mi bshad //
analyzed: yid du 'ong bas cir mi bshad //

analyzed: gang dang gang gi rdzas kyis su //
translated: Whatever substance

analyzed: mi rnams stug por 'grub pa yi //
translated: people are established with,

analyzed: des ni de yi dngos 'gyur pa // sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin //

analyzed: ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs //

original: tshon dang 'byor na rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: tshon dang 'byor na rnam par mdzes //

original: rnal 'byor can dbus khyod de bzhin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can dbus khyod de bzhin //

original: de bzhin gshegs gzugs sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs gzugs sna tshogs kyis //

original: dbang sgyur po brang dge ba na //
analyzed: dbang sgyur po brang dge ba na //
translated: in the virtuous chest of the master of power,

original: thams cad dag na snang ba ni //
analyzed: thams cad dag na snang ba ni //
translated: everything appears

analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyi mdun du byas //
translated: in front of the Victor's son.

original: mya ngan 'da' dang mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' dang mya ngan 'das //
translated: Nirvana and non-nirvana,

original: stug po mthar mchog ye shes te //
analyzed: stug po mthar mchog ye shes te //

original: chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang //

original: stug po rnal 'byor can gyi gnas //
analyzed: stug po rnal 'byor can gyi gnas //
translated: are the abode of the dense yogi.

original: de ni mtshon gyis mi chod de //
analyzed: de ni mtshon gyis mi chod de //

original: de ni mes kyang mi tshig pa //
analyzed: de ni mes kyang mi tshig pa //
translated: and is not burned by fire.

original: mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa //
analyzed: mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa //
translated: It is not cut and not split,

original: de ni yul gnas rtag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni yul gnas rtag pa'o //
translated: and it always abides in the field.

original: de ni chus kyang mi gsher te //
analyzed: de ni chus kyang mi gsher te //
translated: It is not moistened by water

original: rlung gis kyang ni mi skam mo //
analyzed: rlung gis kyang ni mi skam mo //
translated: and is not dried by wind.üîΩIt is not destroyed like a clay pot

original: de ni rdza ltar 'jig pa dang // nan tan byas shes byung ba min //
analyzed: de ni rdza ltar 'jig pa dang // nan tan byas shes byung ba min //

original: rtag pa brtan pa mi 'jig pa //
analyzed: rtag pa brtan pa mi 'jig pa //
translated: It is permanent, stable, and indestructible.

original: skye can kun gyi rnam par shes //
analyzed: skye can kun gyi rnam par shes //

original: rgyu @46a *// yis sun dbyung ma yin pa //
analyzed: rgyu @46a *// yis sun dbyung ma yin pa //

original: 'dra dang mi 'dra rnams kyi ste //
analyzed: 'dra dang mi 'dra rnams kyi ste //
translated: It is the same and not the same

original: dam bcas yan lag rnams kyi yang //
analyzed: dam bcas yan lag rnams kyi yang //
translated: and is the branch of the promise.

original: mtha' ma thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: mtha' ma thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: The end is endless.üîΩThe promise and the promise

original: dam bcas pa yi dam bca' dang // rgyu yi khyad par rgyu dag ste //
analyzed: dam bcas pa yi dam bca' dang // rgyu yi khyad par rgyu dag ste //
translated: are the cause and the distinctions of the cause.

original: de bas de la rgal du med //
analyzed: de bas de la rgal du med //
translated: Therefore, there is no refutation there.

original: rtog pa can gyi spyod yul min //
analyzed: rtog pa can gyi spyod yul min //
translated: It is not the domain of conceptual thought.

original: rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur na //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur na //
translated: When consciousness is transformed,

original: de ni stug po sems spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni stug po sems spangs pa'o //
translated: it is the dense array, free from the mind.

original: rtog can rnams kyi yul ma yin //
analyzed: rtog can rnams kyi yul ma yin //
translated: It is not an object for those with concepts.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang stug /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang stug /
translated: The dense array is the palace of the TathƒÅgata.

original: ma skyes sngon dang tha ma med //
analyzed: ma skyes sngon dang tha ma med //
translated: It is unborn, without beginning or end,

original: lhun gyis grub pa'i stobs las byung //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa'i stobs las byung //
translated: arising from the power of spontaneity.

original: rgyu med pa dang las skyes min //
analyzed: rgyu med pa dang las skyes min //
translated: It is not born from a cause or karma,

original: dbang po chen pos byas pa'ang min //
analyzed: dbang po chen pos byas pa'ang min //
translated: nor is it created by a great lord.

original: gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pa las //
analyzed: gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pa las //
translated: It is beyond form, formless, and desire,

original: yang dag 'das te gnas pa yin //
analyzed: yang dag 'das te gnas pa yin //
translated: and abides.

original: 'dod pa'i khams las 'das nas su //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams las 'das nas su //
translated: Having transcended the desire realm,

original: gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes med //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes med //
translated: it has no perception of form or formlessness.

original: mun pa'i rgyu las rab 'das nas //
analyzed: mun pa'i rgyu las rab 'das nas //
translated: Having completely transcended the cause of darkness,

original: stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes //
translated: the dense array is beautifully arrayed.

original: phyogs 'di mkha' las grub pa ste //
analyzed: phyogs 'di mkha' las grub pa ste //
translated: This direction is formed from space

original: rgyu can rnams kyi spyod yul min //
analyzed: rgyu can rnams kyi spyod yul min //
translated: and is not the domain of those with causes.

original: yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral //
translated: Free from the positions of existence and nonexistence,

original: gcig dang gzhan pa spangs pa'o //üîΩgces pa dang ni rang bzhin min //
analyzed: gcig dang gzhan pa spangs pa'o // gces pa dang ni rang bzhin min //
translated: it is free from singularity and multiplicity.üîΩIt is not cherished, nor is it natural,

original: 'dod rgyal dang yang dbang po min //
analyzed: 'dod rgyal dang yang dbang po min //
translated: nor is it accidental or dependent on faculties.

original: khyu mchog gi yang phyogs ma yin //
analyzed: khyu mchog gi yang phyogs ma yin //
translated: It is not the domain of the best of herds.

original: de bzhin rig can gsum gyi yang //
analyzed: de bzhin rig can gsum gyi yang //
translated: Likewise, it is not the domain of the three learned ones.

original: rdul gyi rkyen las byung ma yin //
analyzed: rdul gyi rkyen las byung ma yin //
translated: It does not arise from the condition of atoms.

original: @46b sgra rnams kyis kyang brjod du med //
analyzed: @46b sgra rnams kyis kyang brjod du med //
translated: It cannot be expressed by words.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis bskyed pa min //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis bskyed pa min //
translated: It is not produced by essence.

original: 'dod rgyal gyis kyang mi rnyed do //
analyzed: 'dod rgyal gyis kyang mi rnyed do //
translated: It is not found by chance.

original: ma rig las dang sred pas min //
analyzed: ma rig las dang sred pas min //
translated: It is not from ignorance, karma, or craving.

original: mi shes las kyang smos pa min //
analyzed: mi shes las kyang smos pa min //
translated: It is not mentioned in the unknown.

original: khur med khur gyi yul yin te //
analyzed: khur med khur gyi yul yin te //
translated: It is the object of the burdenless.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul //
translated: This is the domain of the buddhas.

original: lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs kyis mkhyen //
analyzed: lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs kyis mkhyen //
translated: The tathƒÅgatas know the divine.

original: sa bcu dag tu rnam par sbyangs //
analyzed: sa bcu dag tu rnam par sbyangs //
translated: It is purified in the ten stages.

original: rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs yul //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs yul //
translated: The domain of the yogis is various.

original: don gyi dam pa ston pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi dam pa ston pa'o //
translated: It teaches the highest meaning.

original: las ci las min gang zhes te //
analyzed: las ci las min gang zhes te //
translated: What is karma and what is not karma?

original: byis pa rnams ni myos par gyur //
analyzed: byis pa rnams ni myos par gyur //
translated: The childish become intoxicated.

original: las dang las min bshad pa ni //
analyzed: las dang las min bshad pa ni //
translated: The explanation of karma and non-karma

original: rnal 'byor can rnams bder gyur pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can rnams bder gyur pa //

original: sna tshogs snang ba rang sems te //
analyzed: sna tshogs snang ba rang sems te //
translated: The various appearances are one's own mind.

original: lus can rnams kyi bdag nyid gnyis //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi bdag nyid gnyis //

original: phyi dang nang dang thams cad du //
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang thams cad du //

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa lta bur gnas /
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa lta bur gnas /

original: sems kyis sems ni mthong yin yang //
analyzed: sems kyis sems ni mthong yin yang //

original: khong du mi chud bus pa rnams //
analyzed: khong du mi chud bus pa rnams //

original: kha gnyis sems de lus can gyi //
analyzed: kha gnyis sems de lus can gyi //

original: yin kyang shes par ma gyur pa //
analyzed: yin kyang shes par ma gyur pa //

original: bdag gi byed pa'ang de bzhin byed //
analyzed: bdag gi byed pa'ang de bzhin byed //

original: yul lta bur yang rab tu snang //
analyzed: yul lta bur yang rab tu snang //

original: rdza ma la sogs gzugs su gnas //
analyzed: rdza ma la sogs gzugs su gnas //

original: rdzal sogs pa'ang yod pa min //
analyzed: rdzal sogs pa'ang yod pa min //

original: 'di yi don la thub pa dag /
analyzed: 'di yi don la thub pa dag /
translated: The Sage, with regard to the meaning of this,

original: rnal 'byor nyam chung rnam par myos //
analyzed: rnal 'byor nyam chung rnam par myos //

original: rnal 'byor de yang mi rtogs pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de yang mi rtogs pa //

original: bdag gi rnam rtog lam gnas pas //
analyzed: bdag gi rnam rtog lam gnas pas //
translated: That the path is based on his own concepts.

original: sems 'di gnyis ka'i bdag nyid de //
analyzed: sems 'di gnyis ka'i bdag nyid de //
translated: The mind is the nature of both,

original: me long zla ba bzhin @47a *//
analyzed: me long zla ba bzhin @47a *//

original: du gnas // ji ltar rab rib rab rib can //
analyzed: du gnas // ji ltar rab rib rab rib can //

analyzed: skra tshogs ltos shig ltos shig kye //

analyzed: phan tshun dag tu ston mod kyi //

analyzed: bdag nyes dbang po zhan byung gi /

analyzed: 'di na gang yang skra tshogs med //

analyzed: rgyan dang nor bu dag kyang ngo //

analyzed: yod dang med pa'i dngos po ltar //

analyzed: dbang po'i nyes pas mthong ba yin //

analyzed: de bzhin rtog can dbang gis 'di //
translated: In the same way, the one with concepts,

original: bdag gi blo ni ji ltar gnas //
analyzed: bdag gi blo ni ji ltar gnas //

original: tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas thub par //
analyzed: tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas thub par //

analyzed: rtog pa med pas rab tu 'dzin //

analyzed: gang 'di mang po snang ba dag /

analyzed: sna tshogs tshangs la sogs pa'i mtshan //

analyzed: sna tshogs thams cad bdag gi sems //

original: rdza la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshan //
analyzed: rdza la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshan //

analyzed: nang du gyur pa'i gzugs rnams dang // mtho ris gnas pa'i gnas rnams dang // gang 'di phyi nang bya ba rnams //

analyzed: thams cad sems las byung ba'o //

analyzed: bud med rnams la'ang blo 'khrul pas //

analyzed: 'di rdzun bus pa slu ba yin //

analyzed: rnal 'byor sbyar bar jir mi bya //

analyzed: skyil mo krung du mnyam gzhag cing //

analyzed: rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis //

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs zad par byed //

analyzed: 'gyur ba rab tu ston pa'o //

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas te /

translated: and with the light rays from the jewel on his crown illuminated all the world systems and the princes who were dwelling in the palace of the heart of the jewel in the realm of the lord of the gods.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa la smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa la smras pa /
translated: He said to the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva Bh≈´vi≈õuddhimati, who was teaching the correct arrangement of the bodhisattvas:

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa /
translated: He teaches the correct, just arrangement.

original: kha ba yod pa'i ngos la ri dvags thams cad gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ri dvags kyi rigs shig @59b yod de //
analyzed: kha ba yod pa'i ngos la ri dvags thams cad gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ri dvags kyi rigs shig @59b yod de //
translated: There is a species of deer called ‚Äúkiller of all deer‚Äù on the snowy mountains.

original: de ni gcom sgyu brgya stong gis ri dvags mang po nye bar brid cing thabs la bab pa'i ri dvags rnams bsad cing za'o //
analyzed: de ni gcom sgyu brgya stong gis ri dvags mang po nye bar brid cing thabs la bab pa'i ri dvags rnams bsad cing za'o //
translated: With hundreds of thousands of tricks, he lures many deer and kills and eats the deer who fall into his trap.

original: ri dvags drus ma phru gu dang bcas pa mthong na'ang phru gu'i skad du 'bod do //
analyzed: ri dvags drus ma phru gu dang bcas pa mthong na'ang phru gu'i skad du 'bod do //
translated: If he sees a pregnant deer, he cries out in the voice of a fawn.

original: ri dvags rva can mthong na'ang rva de dang 'dra bar bsgyur te gan du 'gro'o //
analyzed: ri dvags rva can mthong na'ang rva de dang 'dra bar bsgyur te gan du 'gro'o //
translated: If he sees a deer with antlers, he transforms into a deer with antlers and approaches it.

original: de nas de dag de la bag rton pa dang / des de dag bag rton par rig nas bsad cing bsad cing za'o //
analyzed: de nas de dag de la bag rton pa dang / des de dag bag rton par rig nas bsad cing bsad cing za'o //
translated: Then, when they trust him, knowing that they are trusting, he kills them and eats them.

original: rva mthong na'ang rva'i gzugs su bstan te /
analyzed: rva mthong na'ang rva'i gzugs su bstan te /
translated: If he sees antlers, he shows himself in the form of antlers.

original: de dag bag phab nas ji ltar 'dod par bsad cing bsad cing za ste /
analyzed: de dag bag phab nas ji ltar 'dod par bsad cing bsad cing za ste /
translated: When they are relaxed, he kills them as he wishes and eats them.

original: ji ltar ri dvags zhe gtum pa'i ngang tshul can de rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ri dvags gsod pa de bzhin du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'ang phas kyi rgol ba mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba la mngon par zhen pa /üîΩbdag gi chos nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa /

translated: It is the self that is conceived by those who conceive the self as abiding in various ways, from the size of a mustard seed up to the size of a human being.üîΩIt is the self that is conceived by those who conceive the self as abiding in various ways, from the size of a mustard seed up to the size of a human being.üîΩIt is the self that is conceived by those who conceive the self as abiding in various ways, from the size of a mustard seed up to the size of a human being.

analyzed: bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang / @60a *//
translated: It is the self that is conceived by those who conceive the

original: don 'dus pa'i rgyu las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don 'dus pa'i rgyu las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the object is the cause of the collection of meanings.

original: dper na / me tog dang gos su phrad na bsung gi khyad par du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dper na / me tog dang gos su phrad na bsung gi khyad par du 'gyur gyi /
translated: For example, when a flower and a cloth come into contact, there is a difference in fragrance.

original: ma phrad par ni bsung dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma phrad par ni bsung dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if they do not come into contact, the fragrance is not perceived.

original: de bzhin du sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams ma gtogs par don de ma yin par gyur pa snod dang ba dar lta bu'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams ma gtogs par don de ma yin par gyur pa snod dang ba dar lta bu'am /
translated: In the same way, apart from the mind, mental factors, thought, and consciousness, there is no other object that is not that, like a vessel or water.

original: me mar dang rdza lta bu'am /üîΩsmig lo dang ai shi ka lta bu gzhan ni gang yang med de /
analyzed: me mar dang rdza lta bu'am /üîΩsmig lo dang ai shi ka lta bu gzhan ni gang yang med de /
translated: Or like a lamp or a pot.üîΩOr like a mirage or a rainbow.

original: rgyu dang rkyen las sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs rab tu 'byung zhing bdag med la phra ba dang / bskyed du mi rung ba dang / cha med pa dang / dag cing thog ma nas 'od snang ba dang / yul rnam par rig pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul ma gtogs par rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen las sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs rab tu 'byung zhing bdag med la phra ba dang / bskyed du mi rung ba dang / cha med pa dang / dag cing thog ma nas 'od snang ba dang / yul rnam par rig pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul ma gtogs par rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind and mental factors arise from causes and conditions. They are subtle, without self, not suitable to be produced, partless, pure, and luminous from the beginning. They are not perceived by those who are not yogis, who are not noble beings, who do not have the domain of individual knowledge, and who do not have the domain of the knowledge of the noble beings.

original: 'di nyid ni ri dvags kyi gcan gzan zhe gtum po lta bur 'jig rten rnams la yod pa dang / med pa dang / gcig pa dang / mang po dang thams cad dang / thams cad ma yin pa'i lta ba skyed par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni ri dvags kyi gcan gzan zhe gtum po lta bur 'jig rten rnams la yod pa dang / med pa dang / gcig pa dang / mang po dang thams cad dang / thams cad ma yin pa'i lta ba skyed par byed pa ste /
translated: This very [mind] is like a fierce wild animal in the world, producing views of existence, non-existence, one, many, all, and not all.

original: lus can rnam par rig pa tsam du khong du ma chud pa'i rnams bdag dang bdag gir smra ba la mngon par zhen par yang ltung bar byed do //
analyzed: lus can rnam par rig pa tsam du khong du ma chud pa'i rnams bdag dang bdag gir smra ba la mngon par zhen par yang ltung bar byed do //
translated: It causes those who have not understood mere representation to fall into clinging to the self and what belongs to the self, and to speak of them.

original: mi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud par 'dod pa'i blos 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo la zhon zhing 'di dang pha bi nas rab tu rgyug ste /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud par 'dod pa'i blos 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo la zhon zhing 'di dang pha bi nas rab tu rgyug ste /
translated: Because of ignorance, with a mind that wants to understand the Dharma, they ride the wheel of cyclic existence and rush from here to there.

original: dge ba'i @60b bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bral ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i @60b bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bral ba /
translated: They are separated from the spiritual friends, the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: rang gi phyogs las ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar nyams pa'i blo can /
analyzed: rang gi phyogs las ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar nyams pa'i blo can /
translated: They have a mind that is more degenerate than those who are far from their own side.

original: 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad thob par mi nus pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad thob par mi nus pa /
translated: They are unable to attain the eightfold noble path.üîΩThey hold a form that does not engage in any of the three vehicles.

original: theg pa gsum las 'ga' tsam la'ang mi 'jug pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa las rnam par phyir ldog pa ma skyes kyi bar du 'phags pa'i bden pa mi mthong bas /
analyzed: theg pa gsum las 'ga' tsam la'ang mi 'jug pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa las rnam par phyir ldog pa ma skyes kyi bar du 'phags pa'i bden pa mi mthong bas /
translated: Until they turn away from that, they do not see the noble truths.

original: stug po'i dkyil 'khor gyi skal ba can rnams kyang stug po'am stug po'i sgra'ang mi thos so //üîΩyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil 'khor gyi skal ba can rnams kyang stug po'am stug po'i sgra'ang mi thos so // yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa //
translated: Even those who are fortunate enough to be in the mandala of the dense thicket do not hear the sound of the dense thicket.üîΩThis is the teaching on how to set forth the correct reality.

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor can rnams kyi lta ba yongs su sbyang ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor can rnams kyi lta ba yongs su sbyang ba ste /
translated: This is the purification of the view of those who practice.

original: 'di la khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang brtson par gyis shig /
analyzed: 'di la khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang brtson par gyis shig /
translated: You and other bodhisattvas should strive in this.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'jug pa'i gtam gyi tshul yang rnal 'byor can rnams la ston cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'jug pa'i gtam gyi tshul yang rnal 'byor can rnams la ston cig /
translated: And teach the way of the discourse on entering the buddha-field of the dense array to those who are yogis.

original: rang gi rnam par rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: rang gi rnam par rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This is called ‚ÄúThe Object of One‚Äôs Own Cognition,‚Äù the eighth chapter.

original: khab long rdo la ji ltar lcags //
analyzed: khab long rdo la ji ltar lcags //
translated: Just as iron is completely

original: yongs kyis kun tu rab 'khor ba //
analyzed: yongs kyis kun tu rab 'khor ba //
translated: drawn around by a magnet,

original: de bzhin phung po'i shing rta ste //
analyzed: de bzhin phung po'i shing rta ste //

original: stong zhing bag chags byung ba 'khor //
analyzed: stong zhing bag chags byung ba 'khor //

analyzed: rtsva dang 'jim pa shing smig dang // theg pa rnams su 'dus tshogs las //

analyzed: khyim du ji ltar snang gyur pa //

original: de bzhin phung po'i gzugs 'di'o //
analyzed: de bzhin phung po'i gzugs 'di'o //

original: lcags dang khas  long ro langs la //
analyzed: lcags dang khas  long ro langs la //
translated: In iron, magnet, and zombie,

analyzed: sems can nye bar dmigs med kyang //

original: thams cad sems can lta bur g-yo //
analyzed: thams cad sems can lta bur g-yo //

original: de bzhin phung po bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin phung po bdag med pa'o //

original: rgyal sras phyag na @61a *//
analyzed: rgyal sras phyag na @61a *//
translated: The bodhisattvas, the sons of the victors,

original: rin chen gyis //
analyzed: rin chen gyis //

analyzed: gzugs mang rgyal mchog la smras pa //

analyzed: mnyam gzhag rdo rje'i snying po la //

original: rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byas //
analyzed: rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byas //
translated: You, O King, have asked questions.

original: rgyal sras 'jigs med mkhas pa'i rnams //
analyzed: rgyal sras 'jigs med mkhas pa'i rnams //
